summary: Diff implements stable backend site-owner storage with new getSiteOwner/claimSiteOwner APIs and updates frontend admin-route guard + query hooks to detect unclaimed ownership and enable a claim flow. One extra backend behavior assigns an AccessControl admin role during ownership claim, which was not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: On ownership claim, backend also assigns an "#admin" role in the AccessControl system (in addition to persisting siteOwner), introducing role-management behavior not required by the request.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-21/REQ-22 only require persisting a single owner principal and using it as the source of truth for admin authorization, plus APIs to read/claim (and optionally transfer) ownership. The diff adds role assignment side effects beyond those requirements.
